title: Cant ingame reply to friends
body:
I can't message/reply to a friend while im in any gamemode and when i try to do /msg (username) (message) or /reply (username) (message)
it shows ERROR blah blah i forgot what the text says and then it says usage: /msg (username) (message)


Someone please help me out here???

replies.body: I'd like to help with this, but I'd like to get more precise information.  The exact error message can help a lot, as well as any screenshots you might be able to provide.  Is this to any friend, or one specific friend?  Did they change their summoner name?  With some more details, we can try and get this resolved.  Let me know!
Whoops this is reply post I'll try get one asap. about what im getting
I dont know how or when but when i did /reply then it auto corrects and does it stuff and i send a message it works now, thanks for the help!
